Game.Name: Winnie the Pooh's Rumbly Tumbly Adventure & Rayman 3 (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl+En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Sv,No,Da,Fi)
Game.plot: Disney's Winnie the Pooh's Rumbly Tumbly Adventure / Rayman 3 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Various and published by Ubisoft,which was released in Europe in 2006.Cheat: Input those in the password option from the main menu:Cheat: Link the Game Boy Advance to the Gamecube version of Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc to unlock ten bonus levels after collecting over 100 Orbs. Cheat: Doing the Ly bonus stages in the 2nd and 4th world will earn you extra multiplayer games.
